Its capital is Sarh. Manda National Park is in the region. ==Subdivisions== The region of Moyen-Chari is divided into three departments: Department Capital Sub-prefectures Barh Köh Sarh Sarh, Korbol, Koumogo, Moussa Foyo, Balimba Grande Sido Maro, Danamadji, Djéké Djéké, Sido Lac Iro Kyabé Kyabé, Bohobé, Boum Kebbir, Ngondeye, Roro, Baltoubaye, Dindjebo, Alako, Singako Category:Regions of Chad
title: Moyen-Chari (region)
